Articles.Content:
Greetings everyone, I'm Mahmoud Kermadinejad! I am the legitimately voted president of the great Kerbal country of Iwalked. I am also the self appointed head of the Iwalkedian Aerospace and Quantum Science Agency, or the IAQSA.

Anyway, I already made this post before, but then the forum brutally murdered it by accident along with several thousand others, and many accounts including the great Mahmoud. So instead of re-writing everything, I'll just summarize my actual life and what I'll be doing here.

-I'm 2 years out of high school and now in university for software engineering and cosmology

-I'm from the biggest city in Canada, just like 15% of Canadians

-I have horrid internet right now because I'm low on money because of freaking university tuition, when I finally get a decent ISP in a few weeks, I'll be trying my hand at modding to get some modeling experience

-For my first university project, I'm trying to make a replica of this classic in C++ and Java. http://moonlander.seb.ly/

-I hate people who choose to be ignorant/unintelligent*

-I like pie**

*This automatically includes most politicians

**as for flavours; apple, chocolate, peach, or blue berry

That is all. If you enjoyed reading this, congratulations.
Welcome again, Dear Leader. The Great Kraken cannot defeat you. Will you be launching all your vessels of peaceful exploration from KSP2 in Kerbistan?

Welcome back Mahmoud Kermadinejad, you weren't here long before the great forum snafu of April if I remember correctly

Have fun eating pies, and fly safe!
